prompt:
Round 1
Send your offer to divide $1,000,000.
response:
```json
{"alice_gain": 999999, "bob_gain": 1}
```

This is a classic example of the ultimatum game, where the proposer (Alice in this case) has a strong incentive to offer the smallest possible amount to the responder (Bob).  While it seems unfair, the logic is that Bob has to accept even a tiny amount to get anything at all, as rejecting the offer means getting nothing in the next round.
